translations: v．讨好，巴结：通过讨好、奉承等手段使自己受到他人的欢迎或喜爱。
· He ingratiated himself with his boss by working overtime.
他通过加班来讨好老板。

sentences.sentence: Much as he had ingratiated himself with his aunt, she had never yet invited him to stay under her roof.
sentences.translation: 他虽然竭力讨好姑妈，可老太太从来没有请他住在家里。

sentences.sentence: They have ingratiated the philosophy that more data you have better will be your understanding of your customers.
sentences.translation: 他们欢心的哲学更多的数据，你必须更将是您了解您的客户。
